column2: Please see Human Protein Atlas Immunohistochemistry Protocols for more information.

column1: Post-processing From the source data file, normal_tissue.csv, first only data with Reliability = 'Supportive' were retained, and the four qualitative expression values: 'Not detected','Low','Medium' and 'High' were converted to values 0 to 3 respectively. Then, for each gene-tissue-cell type, a minimum expression value was chosen across all biological replicates. Finally, gene names were retrieved from Ensembl 83/GENCODE 24 (GRCh38).
